alert.note: Alert for Kern (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 16 at 10:22AM PDT until March 16 at 8:20PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following county, Kern. * WHEN...Until 500 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1021 AM PDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Delano, Wasco, Shafter, McFarland, Bodfish, Squirrel Mountain Valley, South Lake Cdp, Weldon, Onyx, Lake Isabella, Glennville, Democrat, Wofford Heights, Famoso, Kernville, Riverkern, Mountain Mesa and Walker Pass. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
